## DisplayContainer.applyTransform() method

Applies transform `a` to transform `b`<!-- -->, returning the result. Neither `a` nor `b` are modified.

**Signature:**

```typescript
static applyTransform(a: ITransformView, b: ITransformView): ITransformView;
```

## Parameters

|  Parameter | Type | Description |
|  --- | --- | --- |
|  a | [ITransformView](./bge-core.itransformview.md) | Outer transformation. |
|  b | [ITransformView](./bge-core.itransformview.md) | Inner transformation. |

**Returns:**

[ITransformView](./bge-core.itransformview.md)

The combined transformation.
